title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.34 - Town of Massena
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.34 - Town of Massena

State Regulations
(a) Route 37. The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 37 between State spur 971G
(Massena traffic circle) and the Franklin county line, a distance of 0.7+-
mile. (b) Route 131. Route 131
between Route 37 and CR 42, a distance of 0.4+- mile. (c) CR 42. CR 42 between Route 131 and the

Alcoa Plant, a distance of 2.9 miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8140.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
